name: Lev Leviev
description:
Dear American,

I called Zhumabay Akhmetov. I from excellent republic Kazakhstan. I want make clear one important things: DO NOT BELIEVE FILM, "Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan". It say many wrong thing about my wonderfuls country.

Number one: Borat claim Kazakh womens look like bear. That not true! Yes, there some ugly womens. Some quite nice lookings.

Number second: Borat claim Korki Buchek most popular musicians in Kazakhstan. That not true! Most popular musicians in Kazakhstan, Raushan Orazbayeva.

Number three: Borat claim there many Jew in Kazakhstan. That not true! Very little Jew. Even your great library Wikipedia, has list Asian Jew. No ones from Kazakhstan. Borat speak of Running of Jew? It not real! We need imports Jew for that. Ha ha!

Number four: Borat claim Kazakhstan hate neighbor Uzbekistan. That not true! Uzbeki long friend of Kazakh. But: many Jew in Uzbekistan. Many, many Jew. Example: Lev Leviev, diamond billionaires. Jew! Uzbeki, not Kazakh.

In conclusions, Hail Kazakhstan!

Friend,
Zhumabay Akhmetov
